NF.Q: In the column Consumption of the sankey chart, which nodes have an outflow exceeded 2667? Please list the node labels and their corresponding outflow values.

NF.Q: In the sankey chart, which links have a flow between 1485 and 1858? Please list the source node, target node, and their corresponding flow values.

NC.Q: Between the flows from node Consumption to node Storage and from node Customs Clearance to node Consumption, which path has a larger flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Consumption} to node {Storage} is larger.

NC.Q: Between the flows from node Export Certification to node Consumption and from node Customs Clearance to node Consumption, which path has a larger flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Export Certification} to node {Consumption} is larger.

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Import Inspection to node Consumption, from node Wholesale to node Grinding, and from node Retail Delivery to node Grinding, which path has the largest flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Wholesale} to node {Grinding} is the largest.

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Trade Agreements to node Consumption, from node Retail Delivery to node Sorting, and from node Trade Agreements to node Food Waste, which path has the largest flow?

MSR.Q: What is the path with the highest total flow from source node Export Certification to target node Sorting? Please list all node labels along this path.
